backLink.description: Link that takes the user to the previous step in a process.

errorPrefix.description: Prefix to give assistive-technology users context for an error message. For example, a screen-reader user would hear 'Error: Enter your name'.

errorSummaryTitle.description: Title of the section summarising any errors a user has made.

startButton.description: Button that allows the user to start a process.

continueButton.description: Button that takes the user to the next step in a process but without saving any information.

saveContinueButton.description: Button that saves the userâ€™s information and takes them to the next step in a process.

radioSeparatorLabel.description: Label that separates one or more of your radio options that is different from the others.
